description: I couldn't figure out how to add RSS feeds. From what I can tell, the GUI makes it so that you can't add RSS feeds. If I can't add RSS feeds, then the program is useless to me.

- Pretty interface
- good search
- works perfectly for my needs
summary: Great app, I really like it , nice interface

description: nice app and i like the appearance which looks pretty sophisticated and modern
summary: i like it and appreciate the effort you put in this app. Thank you

description:
- Fast interact
- Easy to use
- Modern UI

Surely if this thing doesnt get the job done for me, i will then simply purge it like immediately.
Great work though. ---- vsv the initial reviews
summary: Needed it for the bbc daily podcasts

description: Simple interface. For the person looking how to add an RSS feed, click the Favourites icon (heart) and the + add RSS feeds.
summary: Simple & how to add RSS feeds

description: I love the app. The only thing i didn't get from your app is the ability to change the playback speed.
It does, what it is supposed to do!
First thing I did when I opened the app was to organize 3 apps I was using now I just use one
summary: Great App I organized all my favorites

description: No any issues everything run well

Podcasts from many countries are available. 
Search works!
... but other than that it seems to work fine.
Loads episodes better than Rhythmbox.
Patriots Weekly, Fast Money and more. Easy to find podcasts, and nice UI.

Poddr is the best podcast player that I've used for Linux. Not only does it look amazing, but it was able to locate several shows that other podcast players could not. 

Only gripe with Poddr is that I've not located how to increase the speed of the audio. Wished that I could listen at 1.5x, rather than 1x.
favorites > click on plus
summary: adding rss podcasts is very easy

description:
wow thank you, ive managed to find my favourite christian podcasts.
thank you for bringing them to linux with this standalone app.

thank you
It has a good podcast recommendation feed

great work man.works smooth
please consider adding more player features.like speeding options while playing podcast

what a great app looks exactly like Cumulonimbus but its easy to use and i like to listen to Christian podcasts, keep up this great work.
thank you
This app is great, the design is beautiful and it just works.

Go to 'Favourites' and click the plus Icon...

Great App!
Poddr is an outstanding podcast player for Linux. It looks amazing and has most podcasts that many do not have.
summary: A must have podcast app for any Linux user

description: App looks good, and more importantly searching and finding podcasts is easy! If I could add one thing to the wish list it would be the ability to use custome themed border and title bars just to match the system. Other than that, the UI is nice, straightfoward, and easy experience. Thank you!
easy to use... finding podcasts is very easy...waiting for the mobile version to use in android..
I've installed this app on all my linux desktops. It's a must! Good looking and easy to maneuvre through. Just a quality software from open source.
Me ha gustado mucho hasta el momento. Se la recomendaría a cualquiera que quiera acceder fácilmente a cualquier programa podcast desde Linux.

The app looks really good and is easy and intuitive to use.

However this is not Free Software. It is locked into the iTunes API and does not allow to enter your other podcasts, even when iTunes's links are broken and outdated.

It locks you in and does not allow importing and exporting your podcasts links.

Additionally it keeps cookies without any notice or permission request, and there is no options to remove them.

Good looking, well intentioned maybe, but not Free Software.
summary: Great looking app, not Free Software, does not respect your privacy

description: So as a few other people noted this client lacks a few features, which for me fall into the "nice but not necessary" category. Much more importantly it periodically stops playback in the middle of an ep and requires restarting the app to continue. I wanted to like it but broken basic functionality is just unacceptable.
Love it. Easy to use, and just does the job. Nice interface too. Very happy! Sometimes pay to take the chance. To the developer: thanks man!

Pros: Looks polished, nice interface, stable
Cons: limited functionality, lacks ability to import or export OPML, edit playlist order
Only audio podcasts play and it doesn't appear to download automatically.
Great app, looks brilliant but doesnt work with many RSS feeds
summary: Doesnt work with many RSS feeds

description:
Sometimes, it's difficult for newbies to add podcast rss manually,
getting rss url is a bit tricky

This app with search option is very good,
glad found it
summary: Easy to use, with search option, the easy one

description: On Ubuntu 22.04.3, Poddr Snap would no longer open. I uninstalled the Snap and downloaded and installed the ".DEB file" from the "Poddr website." It works and now I'm back to listening to podcasts again. (It is interesting how applications that may be "potentially unsafe" actually do work properly.)
summary: A great podcast listening application for Linux, very nicely done

description: Ich nutze Ubuntu 18.04 seit einigen Jahren das erste mal wieder und habe direkt nach einer guten Podcast Anwendung gesucht. Diese habe ich installiert und ich bin einfach begeistert. Super Funktionen, kein langwieriges Suchen nach Podcasts. Alles funktioniert perfekt.

Ich nutze poddr seit einem halben Jahr und bin begeistert. Über die Suche oder über Vorschläge findet man alle Podcasts des gewünschten Sprachraums und kann sie den Favoriten hinzufügen. Super praktisch ist, dass man mit copy und paste den Link zum gefundenen Podcast auch direk für den Fritz Box Mediaserver nutzen kann, um auch am Telefon die Podcasts zu hören.

El que tenga alguna queja que prepare una mejor.
Funciona muy bien.
NI siquiera arranca

muy buena aplicación con un entorno grafico muy funcional pero deberían tener una pagina web con la información de la aplicación y el manual de usa para agregar también una web y un manual para agregar las RSS FEED
summary: funciona muy bien pero falta mas contenido

description: tarda mucho en instalarse y me gustaria escuchar radios de mi pais
es cierto tarda mucho en instalarse pero son temas interesantes

Es un servidor gráfico correcto y versatil para encontrar podcast, pero sorprende que estando disponible en una versión Snap la interfaz no se adapte al sistema de la distribución. Como alternativa, aunque con bugs, hay varias en flatpak. Consejo: buscad APP que reciban actualizaciones.

La más estable fuera de estas apreciaciones sería Pocket Casts.
Lorsque je recherche un Podcast et que je veux voir ses différents épisodes ou l'ajouter à mes favoris, Poddr m'affiche un message d'erreur. Bref, c'est inutilisable :(
